name: KHUSHI
greetingText: I really like your name btw!.... Every day with you feels warmer, brighter, and more meaningful. You are my favorite person, my safe place, and my greatest happiness. I love you more than words can ever show. â¤ï¸
wishText: Aankhon me teri Ajab si Ajab si aadae hai, Dil ko bna de malang ye teri wo hawayeinn hai ğŸ«
